full_description:
Lenovo IdeaPad Gaming Modern Backpack for 16" Laptop

The Lenovo IdeaPad Gaming Modern Backpack is a revolutionary solution for eco-conscious gamers who prioritize sustainability and style. This sleek, unisex backpack is not only a fashion statement but also a testament to Lenovo's dedication to environmental responsibility. Crafted from recycled plastic sourced from up to three 500ml bottles, it boasts a unique blend of materials that make it ultra-durable, lightweight, and water-resistant. The backpack's thoughtful design extends beyond aesthetics, featuring zippered pockets for organized and protected storage of gaming peripherals and a 16” laptop. Each backpack is environmentally friendly because it is made with three recycled 500ml plastic bottles. Because of its top-roll construction and coated surface, which offer great weather resistance, your gaming gear will stay safe no matter what happens. Comfort during prolonged usage is ensured with the ventilated back padding, cushioned shoulder straps, and Lycra water bottle holders on either side that provide easy access to water. The comfortable handheld carrying experience is enhanced by the sturdy PU-wrapped handle, and traveling is made effortless with the easy-commute luggage strap. Accept sustainability without compromising: the Lenovo IdeaPad Gaming Modern Backpack reduces the amount of plastic trash that ends up in landfills and rivers in addition to being a stylish accessory. With this gaming companion's ultra-durable construction and water-resistant design, you can confidently take on life's challenges knowing your gadgets are secured in every scenario. Use Lenovo to play games sensibly and attractively.

Lenovo B210 Casual Backpack for 15.6" Laptop

The Lenovo B210 Casual Backpack combines a water-resistant fabric with a clean, minimalist design to produce a case that is ideal for modern living. It has an integrated laptop compartment that accommodates most computers up to 15.6", a variety of interior pockets for those must-have accessories, and a large main area for books and other belongings.

High-quality, durable and water-repellent fabric

The Lenovo B210 Casual Backpack is made of water-repellent snow yarn polyester that is lightweight and durable for your laptop and personal things.

Large laptop compartment – fits up to 15.6" laptops

The bag is specifically intended to keep your laptop safe. It has a cushioned laptop compartment that is perfect for keeping most notebook computers (up to 15.6") safe and secure.

Conveniently placed storage

In addition to the laptop compartment, there are quick-access pockets for mobile devices, business cards, and other everyday needs. Extra room is provided in the main compartment for magazines, notepads, and other laptop accessories.

Lenovo Legion 15.6-inch Recon Gaming Backpack

The Lenovo Legion 15.6" Recon Gaming Backpack is designed for gamers who keep their virtual world beside them during their daily life. Fits up to 15.6" laptop with a dedicated compartment and it also has a water bottle pocket & dedicated pocket for storage headset/mouse/etc. This sleek and modern backpack has a water-repellent front panel for superior protection. It also features a rugged base for added protection. The Lenovo Legion 15.6" Recon Gaming Backpack comes with a ventilated back padding with a padded handle & shoulder straps to ensure comfort while on the move.
